name: The Kind-Ers
description:
Created in 24 hour for the Ukie Student Raise The Game Jam, under the theme Inclusivity and Diversity.

The game sees the players controlling 4 adorable individuals, who each have their own strengths and weaknesses, the player must traverse the single level, and reach the end with all of the characters to complete the game.

Made by team "No Breakfast Club"

Credits:

  • Producer: Jake de Búrca
  • Sound & Music: Ryan Boyack
  • Art: Kristina Cutajar, Courtney Spivey
  • Design: Sandy Steele, Courtney Spivey
  • Programming: Mauro Lana, Sandy Steele
